trans-unit.source: Represents the standard parameters for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Representa los parámetros estándar para el algoritmo de criptografía de curva elíptica (ECC).

trans-unit.source: Represents the curve associated with the public key (<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Q" />) and the optional private key (<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D" />).
trans-unit.target: Representa la curva asociada a la clave pública (<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Q" />) y la clave privada opcional (<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D" />).

trans-unit.source: Represents the private key <see langword="D" /> for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm, stored in big-endian format.
trans-unit.target: Representa la clave privada <see langword="D" /> para el algoritmo de criptografía de curva elíptica (ECC), que se almacena en formato big endian.

trans-unit.source: Represents the public key <see langword="Q" /> for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Representa la clave pública <see langword="Q" /> para el algoritmo de criptografía de curva elíptica (ECC).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Validate%2A> method checks the integrity of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters> structure, throwing a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> when it is not valid.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Validate%2A> método comprueba la integridad de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters> estructura, generando un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> cuando no es válido.

trans-unit.source: are required fields and must have the same length.
trans-unit.target: son campos obligatorios y deben tener la misma longitud.

trans-unit.source: If the curve is an explicit curve, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D> is required and must have the same length as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve.Order>.
trans-unit.target: Si la curva es una curva explícita, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D> es necesario y debe tener la misma longitud que <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve.Order>.

trans-unit.source: If the curve is a named curve, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D> is required and must have the same length as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Q>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECPoint.X>
trans-unit.target: Si la curva es una curva con nombre, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D> es necesario y debe tener la misma longitud que <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Q>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECPoint.X>

trans-unit.source: The key or curve parameters are not valid for the current curve type.
trans-unit.target: La clave o parámetros de curva no son válidos para el tipo de curva actual.
